lines.text: Hm... this toilet is pretty suspicious.
...How so?
Well, I don't know, exactly...
...but we should totally add it to evidence, so we can make theories!
What? No, why would the toilet matter?
I don't know yet, but...
No, I'm puttin' the kibosh on that.
Who knows what kinda grossout jokes you're gonna make if I let you do that?
Really good ones!
No.
...What if this thing's more relevant than it seems?
Oh, great. What do you mean by that?
I mean... you could totally use this thing to flush evidence, right?
We might want to check the plumbing, or something.
...That's... actually a decent point.
Hey, Wirebrush. You got access to the septic system?
Yeah, no, I know. Don't gotta do it yourself, just send in one of the rookies.
In case there's evidence, yeah. Uh-huh.
...Well, let us know if you find anything. And give whatever poor sap you send a bonus, or somethin'.
There. Happy?
...So, like, we can add it to evidence now, right?
No.
Okay, here we go! Time to double-check this thing for evidence!
...Yep, time to get up-close and personal with the toilet!
Really give it a good once-over to find clues!
...I'll do that later!
Or not at all, if you want, since it ain't important.
Okay, this time, I'm sure it's important!
Someone could TOTALLY use a toilet to fake their death!
Do I wanna know how that is?
Yeah! And it's... by...
There was some sorta trick involving...
Well, let's add it to evidence, and we can go through the possibilities one by one!
No.
C'mon!
Not happenin'.
We're near the end of the game! I've been saving up so many great poop jokes!
That's exactly why it ain't happenin', Seeker.
Just a totally unsuspicious toilet, apparently.
Lousy killjoy boss...
